channel.title: Projects on Jack 'Wax' Reynolds
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Jack 'Wax' Reynolds

item.title: Exchange
item.description: In most story-driven video games, the player character is one who has little to no backstory, such that the player can see the character they are playing as an extension of themselves. What if this wasn’t the case? What if the player character had a whole life they lead unbeknownst to the player at the game’s start? Then we can think of playing as this person as almost like a possession.
